How many people are affected by Muckle-Wells syndrome ?,"Muckle-Wells syndrome is a rare disorder. It has been reported in many regions of the world, but its prevalence is unknown.",GHR,Muckle-Wells syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Muckle-Wells syndrome ?,"Mutations in the NLRP3 gene
